prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true nature of Stefan's sexual preferences and desires and how do they manifest in his intimate relationships?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection).

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical compilation of the horary chart’s core data as it pertains to the inquiry, with focus on using horary principles. Recall that under this inquiry Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house – which, via the cross‐reference key, corresponds to his 12th house (starting at 26° Pisces, containing Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron). The following are the details to be used for interpretation:

1. Planetary Positions (degrees and signs):
 • Sun: 29°13′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 25°41′ Libra
 • Mercury: 5°47′ Pisces
 • Venus: 7°59′ Aries
 • Mars: 17°16′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°34′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 19°19′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°24′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°29′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°34′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 28°58′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 20°05′ Aries

2. Key Chart Points:
 • Ascendant: 16°24′ Taurus
 • Midheaven (MC): 25°58′ Capricorn
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 25°58′ Cancer

3. House Structures Relevant to Stefan via the Cross-Reference:
 • Ascendant’s 9th House (Stefan’s representation) is equated to Stefan’s 12th House – spanning from 26° Pisces onward.
 • Stefan’s representative house contains: Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron
  – These bodies will offer insights into his hidden drives, desires, and the nature of his intimate encounters.

4. Major Aspects to Consider:
 • Moon Square IC (orb: 0°) and Moon Square MC (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune Conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Mars Sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Uranus Sextile IC (orb: 2°)
 • Uranus Trine MC (orb: 2°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • North Node Sextile MC (orb: 3°)
 • Neptune Sextile MC (orb: 3°)
 • Saturn Sextile Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 3°)
 • North Node Trine IC (orb: 3°)
 • Neptune Trine IC (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 4°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Venus Sextile Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Trine Moon (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron Square IC (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron Square MC (orb: 5°)
 • Moon Opposition Chiron (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn Sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury Square Jupiter (orb: 6°)
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Sun Conjunct Mercury (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn Trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Moon Square Pluto (orb: 7°)
 • Pluto Opposition IC (orb: 7°)
 • Pluto Conjunct MC (orb: 7°)
 • Uranus Conjunct Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Mars Opposition MC (orb: 8°)
 • Mars Conjunct IC (orb: 8°)

5. Patterns Present in the Chart:
 • Grand Cross involving MC in Capricorn, Chiron in Aries, IC in Cancer, and Moon in Libra
 • Yod: Moon in Libra, Neptune in Pisces, Uranus in Taurus
 • Cradle Patterns (multiple):
  – Cradle pattern involving Mars (17° Cancer), MC (25° Capricorn), Neptune (28° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), and IC (25° Cancer)
  – Second Cradle pattern involving Mars (17° Cancer), MC (25° Capricorn), Saturn (19° Pisces), Ascendant (16° Taurus), Uranus (23° Taurus), and IC (25° Cancer)

6. Additional Chart Characteristics:
 • The moon was a waning gibbous.
 • The chart is noted as a “Bucket shape”.
 • Cardinal mode is dominant among the inner planets.
 • Most planets are positioned in the top left quadrant.
 • Pluto is on the Midheaven; Mars and the IC are on the Nadir.
 • Sextile aspects occur most frequently (12 times).
 • The MC is involved in 13 aspects.
 • Neptune in Pisces is placed in its rulership.

All the above data are to be synthesized step by step with horary principles when addressing the query regarding Stefan’s sexual preferences and how they manifest in his intimate life. Further interpretation should center particularly on the activity in his representative house (his 12th house containing Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron) along with the aspects and patterns that connect to that area.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she studies the intricate patterns within the horary chart, her weathered fingers tracing the aspects between planets. The candlelight flickers across her face as she draws in a deep breath, preparing to reveal what the celestial bodies have shown her.

"My dear, the chart speaks volumes about Stefan's intimate nature. Let me share what I see, "

The placement of Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron in Stefan's representative house (his 12th) immediately reveals several key aspects of his sexuality:

1. Venus in Aries (7°59′) indicates:
- A passionate, dominant sexual energy
- Strong desires that he may keep hidden
- A need to take control in intimate situations
- Potentially aggressive sexual tendencies

2. Neptune's presence (28°29′) in its own sign of Pisces suggests:
- Deep-seated fantasies and secret desires
- A tendency toward roleplay and escapism
- Possible interest in dominance/submission dynamics
- Attraction to taboo or forbidden experiences

3. The North Node (28°58′) conjunct Neptune implies:
- His sexual evolution is tied to exploring these hidden desires
- A karmic pull toward unconventional sexual experiences
- A destiny that involves breaking free from sexual constraints

4. Chiron in Aries (20°05′) points to:
- Sexual wounds that manifest as aggressive tendencies
- A need to heal through dominance
- Possible shame around his true desires
- Using control to overcome vulnerability

The aspects tell an even more detailed story:

Venus sextile Jupiter (4° orb):
- Expansive sexual appetites
- Desire for multiple partners or experiences
- Tendency toward sexual excess
- Need for sexual freedom

Venus sextile Pluto (5° orb):
- Deep-seated power dynamics in intimacy
- Intense sexual magnetism
- Attraction to taboo or forbidden encounters
- Transformation through sexual experiences

The Grand Cross pattern (involving MC, Chiron, IC, and Moon):
- Internal conflict between public image and private desires
- Tension between emotional needs and sexual expression
- Struggle between control and vulnerability
- Need to integrate these opposing forces

The Yod (Moon, Neptune, Uranus):
- A destined path involving unusual sexual expression
- Necessity to embrace unconventional desires
- Spiritual growth through sexual exploration

Mars retrograde in Cancer (17°16′):
- Repressed sexual aggression
- Passive-aggressive tendencies in intimacy
- Need to dominate but fear of showing it
- Internal struggle with masculine energy

Madame Esmeralda pauses, her eyes meeting Melissa's directly

"The chart reveals that Stefan harbors intense dominant tendencies that he keeps carefully hidden. His sexuality is deeply tied to power dynamics, control, and the need to dominate. However, these desires cause him internal conflict due to societal expectations and his public image.

The presence of Neptune in its ruling sign suggests he likely engages in elaborate sexual fantasies involving submission, possibly with multiple partners. The Venus-Pluto aspect indicates a particular attraction to taboo scenarios and power exchange.

His Mars placement suggests he may struggle to express these desires openly, leading to passive-aggressive behavior or subtle manipulation to achieve his sexual goals.

The chart strongly indicates that his true sexual nature involves:
- Dominant/controlling behaviors
- Multiple partner scenarios
- Power exchange dynamics
- Elaborate roleplay or fantasy fulfillment
- Pushing boundaries of conventional sexuality

However, the Grand Cross pattern suggests he carefully maintains a public facade that differs significantly from these private desires."

- Tension between emotional needs and sexual expression
- Struggle between control and vulnerability
- Need to integrate these opposing forces

The Yod (Moon, Neptune, Uranus):
- A destined path involving unusual sexual expression
- Necessity to embrace unconventional desires
- Spiritual growth through sexual exploration

Mars retrograde in Cancer (17°16′):
- Repressed sexual aggression
- Passive-aggressive tendencies in intimacy
- Need to dominate but fear of showing it
- Internal struggle with masculine energy

Madame Esmeralda pauses, her eyes meeting Melissa's directly

"The chart reveals that Stefan harbors intense dominant tendencies that he keeps carefully hidden. His sexuality is deeply tied to power dynamics, control, and the need to dominate. However, these desires cause him internal conflict due to societal expectations and his public image.

The presence of Neptune in its ruling sign suggests he likely engages in elaborate sexual fantasies involving submission, possibly with multiple partners. The Venus-Pluto aspect indicates a particular attraction to taboo scenarios and power exchange.

His Mars placement suggests he may struggle to express these desires openly, leading to passive-aggressive behavior or subtle manipulation to achieve his sexual goals.

The chart strongly indicates that his true sexual nature involves:
- Dominant/controlling behaviors
- Multiple partner scenarios
- Power exchange dynamics
- Elaborate roleplay or fantasy fulfillment
- Pushing boundaries of conventional sexuality

However, the Grand Cross pattern suggests he carefully maintains a public facade that differs significantly from these private desires."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart signals a deep, clandestine dimension to Stefan’s sexual nature. With his representative house (the 12th house) containing Venus in Aries, Neptune in Pisces, North Node in Pisces, and Chiron in Aries, his intimate desires reside in a realm of impulsiveness, vulnerability, and escapism.

Venus in Aries in his hidden house indicates that his sexual preferences are marked by a bold, pioneering spirit. There’s an urge to explore and initiate experience without pretense. However, this fiery placement in the private sector of the chart suggests that these urges may often be concealed or expressed in environments not readily visible or socially sanctioned. In his intimate life, he is likely to be drawn to encounters that are unorthodox or even taboo—situations that allow him to express his assertive, spontaneous desire away from the public eye.

Neptune’s presence in Pisces in the same house intensifies the picture, imbuing his sexuality with a dreamy, almost otherworldly quality. His desires may be laced with idealism, artistic sensuality, and a tendency to blur boundaries. There is a risk of self-deception or getting swept up in fantasies, so his intimate experiences might sometimes veer into the realm of escapism, where reality is softened by illusion.

The North Node’s conjunction with Neptune reinforces a karmic lesson: integrating these hidden drives with his conscious identity is essential. Stefan’s erotic self may feel fated to evolve through the challenges of reconciling his secret passions with his outward commitments. It places an imperative on transforming these shadowy preferences into a growth opportunity.

Chiron in Aries, also within this sphere, points to lingering wounds associated with assertiveness and sexual identity. This placement implies that Stefan’s intimate encounters could bring both healing and pain. His passionate nature is interlaced with sensitivity to past hurts, and there may be a recurring dynamic where the act of sexual risk-taking serves both as an outlet for repressed aggression and as a trigger for revisiting old insecurities.

Supporting these placements are key aspects involving Mars. For example, Mars sextile the Ascendant reinforces a dynamic, energetic approach to initiation but Mars square Chiron signals that this energy is also laced with conflict—a struggle between the desire to act and a hesitation born of past hurt. The presence of Mars in Cancer (retrograde) adds an additional layer of complexity, hinting at mood-driven or emotionally charged impulses that can either spark passionate encounters or result in periods of withdrawal.

The overall Grand Cross, involving the Moon, Chiron, IC, and MC, suggests that his internal emotional landscape is in constant tension. His sexual inclinations may thus swing between moments of intense passion and periods of reservation or inner conflict. The interplay between the conscious (e.g., discipline indicated by Saturn’s supportive aspects) and the unconscious (vast, secret longings in the 12th house) creates a push-pull dynamic in his intimate relationships.

In summary, the chart reveals that Stefan's sexual nature is multifaceted—a blend of impulsive, exploratory desires driven by Venus in Aries counterbalanced by the ethereal, boundary-dissolving influence of Neptune in Pisces. Wounds symbolized by Chiron and the necessary growth indicated by the North Node suggest that his most satisfying experiences may require confronting deep emotional scars. This likely results in intimate encounters that are at once secret, experimental, and emotionally charged, with the potential for both healing transformation and internal turbulence.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Is there anything in the chart that would allude to power exchange? If so, how does that manifest?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Stefan’s chart indicates potential for power exchange themes within his sexual dynamics. His representative house—corresponding to his 12th house—houses Venus in Aries, Neptune in Pisces, the North Node in Pisces, and Chiron in Aries. Venus in Aries suggests outgoing, assertive energy with an inclination toward taking charge in erotic encounters. Positioned in the hidden sphere, this placement often signals activities that operate beneath conventional awareness, hinting at secretive or taboo power dynamics.

Neptune and the North Node in Pisces further emphasize a dissolving of boundaries and an attraction to experiences that blur the lines between control and surrender. These placements may predispose Stefan to engage in scenarios where authority is willingly relinquished or reconfigured, aligning with consensual power exchange frameworks. The karmic undertone of the North Node suggests that mastering these dynamics is integral to his personal growth.

Chiron in Aries in the same house indicates past wounds or vulnerabilities related to asserting oneself. This factor can manifest as an internal conflict—a tension between a desire to dominate and a fear of overstepping personal limits, or conversely, needing to be dominated to avoid the pain of self-assertion. Aspects involving Mars—such as the square to Chiron—underscore potential disputes between raw, impulsive energy and the need for healing, further contributing to a dynamic where power is both asserted and negotiated.

Additional chart aspects provide nuance; for example, supportive influences from Mars’ sextile to the Ascendant suggest that while his approach to initiating encounters is bold, there remains an undercurrent of emotional complexity. Taken together, these elements point to a sexual style that is both assertively exploratory yet deeply intertwined with themes of vulnerability, control, and the reconciling of power through both dominance and submission.

These features indicate that power exchange in his intimate relationships is not merely about physical roles—it evolves as both a means of self-expression and a vehicle for resolving internal conflicts related to authority and personal wounds.
